examples.example: 我刚刚完成了一项很有意义的任务，感觉特别有成就感。

translate.english: I have just completed a very meaningful task and feel particularly fulfilled.

examples.example: 我刚刚成功地解决了一个难题，心情十分愉悦。

translate.english: I just successfully solved a difficult problem and felt very happy.

examples.example: 我刚刚帮助了一位老人过马路，心里美滋滋的。

translate.english: I just helped an old man cross the road and felt very pleased.
